Meaning…?

It must be an animal that became extinct in ancient times.

I’ve got to send this back to Professor Henslow.

Huh? You mean we’ve got to take this thing with us?

Wh-What’s that?

What nerve, bringing such rubbish on our

small ship!

It looks like a fossil, not rubbish, sir.

If I say it’s rubbish, it's rubbish!

Captain, you’ve got to talk him out

of it!

He’s now the ship’s official naturalist, so what can I do?

Hmm.

I found a giant fossil, and it needs to be sent to Professor Henslow so he can identify it.

That would

surely make

you quite

the laughingstock.
